txt.en: Many are the gifts that await those who participate in the celebration of Midsummer, but for revelers who join in the merriment for many days, the gifts are all the grander!

As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows for three days!
Faeleth can be found in Minas Tirith (Midsummer).\n\nFaeleth would like to thank you for your continued celebration of Midsummer.
'You have celebrated Midsummer for three days?\n\n'Well, well... I suppose you have earned one more gift for spreading the spirit of Midsummer!'
'You've celebrated Midsummer for three days?\n\n'Well, well... I suppose you've earned one more gift for spreading the spirit of Midsummer!'

As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows for five days!
Mara Sandydowns would like to thank you for your continued participation in the Yule Festival.

As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows!
Complete 'In Celebration of Midsummer' three times
Talk to Faeleth in Minas Tirith (Midsummer)
Talk to Captain Kh√¢taphos at Furtherholm in the Shield Isles
